
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(dbplyr)
db <- dbConnect(SQLite(), "disco.db")
# original
tracks <- tbl(db, "tracks")
# dplyr
tracks %>% head(3)
```

```{r}
meanTracks <- tracks %>%
group_by(AlbumId) %>%
summarise(AvLen = mean(Milliseconds, na.rm = TRUE),
AvCost = mean(UnitPrice, na.rm = TRUE))
meanTracks
```

```{r}
meanTracks %>% show_query()
```

```{r}
mT <- meanTracks %>% collect()
mT
```
